name: Croma turret
description:
Croma turret is a little short stationary top down shooter in which you combine and use colours to defeat an army of enemies that had stolen the colour of a beautiful planet 

Available in both, English and Spanish

It has a spooky game over that may disturb some people so (+13 maybe?)

The controls are shown in game however I will add them here too:

F11 = Full screen

"O" = Adjust the game window

Space bar = Skip cut scenes

"Q", "W" & "E" = Select colours: red, yellow and blue respectively  

"A", "S" & "D" = Select colours: green, purple and orange respectively  

Left mouse = shoot (with a selected color) / throw color bomb (without a selected color and a croma crystal)

Right mouse = restore HP (with 3 croma crystals)

There is also a pre release version with different mechanics, if you want to play that one it's included in the files!

This is actually my first game, before natural defence, and I'm planing to remake it whenever I have more experience, with more content and quality.

I know most of the flaws that this game has but yet I want your frankest feedback so I can keep improving!
